// 初始化测试数据
export const initializeTestData = () => {
  // 检查是否已经有测试数据
  const existingRequests = localStorage.getItem('userRequests');
  if (existingRequests && JSON.parse(existingRequests).length > 0) {
    return; // 如果已有数据，不重复初始化
  }

  // 创建一些测试请求数据
  const testRequests = [{
    id: 'req-001',
    title: '需要帮助购买生活用品',
    category: 'shopping',
    description: '我是一位行动不便的老人，需要有人帮忙到超市购买一些日常生活用品，包括食物、清洁用品等。',
    location: '北京市朝阳区建国门外大街',

    volunteersNeeded: 1,
    contactMethod: 'phone',
    additionalNotes: '希望志愿者有购物经验，能够帮助选择新鲜的蔬菜和水果。',

    shortlistCount: 3,
    requesterId: 'pin-user-001',
    requesterName: 'PIN用户1',
    requesterEmail: 'pin1@example.com',
    requesterPhone: '138-0001-0001',
    requesterAddress: '北京市朝阳区建国门外大街1号'
  }, {
    id: 'req-002',
    title: '医院陪同看病',
    category: 'medical',
    description: '需要有人陪同我去医院做定期检查，主要是帮助我理解医生的建议和记录重要信息。',
    location: '上海市静安区华山路',
    urgency: 'high',
    expectedDate: '2025-11-07',
    expectedTime: '09:00',
    volunteersNeeded: 1,
    contactMethod: 'phone',
    additionalNotes: '预计需要3-4小时，医院停车比较困难，建议乘坐公共交通。',
    status: 'pending',
    createdAt: '2025-11-06T08:15:00.000Z',
    viewCount: 28,
    shortlistCount: 7,
    requesterId: 'pin-user-002',
    requesterName: 'PIN用户2',
    requesterEmail: 'pin2@example.com',
    requesterPhone: '138-0002-0002',
    requesterAddress: '上海市静安区华山路200号'
  }, {
    id: 'req-003',
    title: '电脑技术支持',
    category: 'technology',
    description: '我的电脑出现了一些问题，需要有技术经验的志愿者帮助我解决软件安装和使用方面的问题。',
    location: '广州市天河区珠江新城',
    urgency: 'low',
    expectedDate: '2025-11-09',
    expectedTime: '19:00',
    volunteersNeeded: 1,
    contactMethod: 'email',
    additionalNotes: '主要是帮助安装一些办公软件和教我如何使用。',
    status: 'pending',
    createdAt: '2025-11-06T14:20:00.000Z',
    viewCount: 12,
    shortlistCount: 2,
    requesterId: 'pin-user-003',
    requesterName: 'PIN用户3',
    requesterEmail: 'pin3@example.com',
    requesterPhone: '138-0003-0003',
    requesterAddress: '广州市天河区珠江新城10号'
  }, {
    id: 'req-004',
    title: '紧急家务帮助',
    category: 'household',
    description: '由于突发情况，急需有人帮助整理房间和清洁卫生。家里来了客人，但我身体不适无法处理。',
    location: '深圳市南山区科技园',
    urgency: 'urgent',
    expectedDate: '2025-11-06',
    expectedTime: '16:00',
    volunteersNeeded: 2,
    contactMethod: 'phone',
    additionalNotes: '主要是客厅和卧室的整理，预计需要2-3小时。',
    status: 'pending',
    createdAt: '2025-11-06T12:45:00.000Z',
    viewCount: 45,
    shortlistCount: 12,
    requesterId: 'pin-user-004',
    requesterName: 'PIN用户4',
    requesterEmail: 'pin4@example.com',
    requesterPhone: '138-0004-0004',
    requesterAddress: '深圳市南山区科技园南区'
  }, {
    id: 'req-005',
    title: '老人陪伴聊天',
    category: 'companion',
    description: '我是一位独居老人，希望有年轻人能来陪我聊天，分享一些生活趣事，让我不那么孤单。',
    location: '杭州市西湖区文三路',
    urgency: 'low',
    expectedDate: '2025-11-10',
    expectedTime: '15:00',

    contactMethod: 'phone',
    additionalNotes: '每周定期陪伴，时间灵活，主要是聊天和下棋。',
    status: 'pending',
    createdAt: '2025-11-06T09:30:00.000Z',
    viewCount: 20,
    shortlistCount: 5,
    requesterId: 'pin-user-005',
    requesterName: 'PIN用户5',
    requesterEmail: 'pin5@example.com',
    requesterPhone: '138-0005-0005',
    requesterAddress: '杭州市西湖区文三路100号'
  }];

  // 保存测试数据到localStorage
  localStorage.setItem('userRequests', JSON.stringify(testRequests));
  console.log('测试数据已初始化，共', testRequests.length, '条请求');
};

// 清除测试数据的函数
export const clearTestData = () => {
  localStorage.removeItem('userRequests');
  console.log('测试数据已清除');
};

// 添加单个测试请求的函数
export const addTestRequest = requestData => {
  const existingRequests = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userRequests') || '[]');
  const newRequest = {
    id: `req-${Date.now()}`,
    ...requestData,
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    viewCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 50),
    shortlistCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10),
    status: 'pending'
  };
  existingRequests.push(newRequest);
  localStorage.setItem('userRequests', JSON.stringify(existingRequests));
  console.log('已添加测试请求:', newRequest.title);
  return newRequest;
};

sourcesContent:
// 初始化测试数据
export const initializeTestData = () => {
  // 检查是否已经有测试数据
  const existingRequests = localStorage.getItem('userRequests');
  if (existingRequests && JSON.parse(existingRequests).length > 0) {
    return; // 如果已有数据，不重复初始化
  }

  // 创建一些测试请求数据
  const testRequests = [
    {
      id: 'req-001',
      title: '需要帮助购买生活用品',
      category: 'shopping',
      description: '我是一位行动不便的老人，需要有人帮忙到超市购买一些日常生活用品，包括食物、清洁用品等。',
      location: '北京市朝阳区建国门外大街',
      urgency: 'medium',
      expectedDate: '2025-11-08',
      expectedTime: '14:00',
      volunteersNeeded: 1,
      contactMethod: 'phone',
      additionalNotes: '希望志愿者有购物经验，能够帮助选择新鲜的蔬菜和水果。',
      status: 'pending',
      createdAt: '2025-11-06T10:30:00.000Z',
      viewCount: 15,
      shortlistCount: 3,
      requesterId: 'pin-user-001',
      requesterName: 'PIN用户1',
      requesterEmail: 'pin1@example.com',
      requesterPhone: '138-0001-0001',
      requesterAddress: '北京市朝阳区建国门外大街1号'
    },
    {
      id: 'req-002',
      title: '医院陪同看病',
      category: 'medical',
      description: '需要有人陪同我去医院做定期检查，主要是帮助我理解医生的建议和记录重要信息。',
      location: '上海市静安区华山路',
      urgency: 'high',
      expectedDate: '2025-11-07',
      expectedTime: '09:00',
      volunteersNeeded: 1,
      contactMethod: 'phone',
      additionalNotes: '预计需要3-4小时，医院停车比较困难，建议乘坐公共交通。',
      status: 'pending',
      createdAt: '2025-11-06T08:15:00.000Z',
      viewCount: 28,
      shortlistCount: 7,
      requesterId: 'pin-user-002',
      requesterName: 'PIN用户2',
      requesterEmail: 'pin2@example.com',
      requesterPhone: '138-0002-0002',
      requesterAddress: '上海市静安区华山路200号'
    },
    {
      id: 'req-003',
      title: '电脑技术支持',
      category: 'technology',
      description: '我的电脑出现了一些问题，需要有技术经验的志愿者帮助我解决软件安装和使用方面的问题。',
      location: '广州市天河区珠江新城',
      urgency: 'low',
      expectedDate: '2025-11-09',
      expectedTime: '19:00',
      volunteersNeeded: 1,
      contactMethod: 'email',
      additionalNotes: '主要是帮助安装一些办公软件和教我如何使用。',
      status: 'pending',
      createdAt: '2025-11-06T14:20:00.000Z',
      viewCount: 12,
      shortlistCount: 2,
      requesterId: 'pin-user-003',
      requesterName: 'PIN用户3',
      requesterEmail: 'pin3@example.com',
      requesterPhone: '138-0003-0003',
      requesterAddress: '广州市天河区珠江新城10号'
    },
    {
      id: 'req-004',
      title: '紧急家务帮助',
      category: 'household',
      description: '由于突发情况，急需有人帮助整理房间和清洁卫生。家里来了客人，但我身体不适无法处理。',
      location: '深圳市南山区科技园',
      urgency: 'urgent',
      expectedDate: '2025-11-06',
      expectedTime: '16:00',
      volunteersNeeded: 2,
      contactMethod: 'phone',
      additionalNotes: '主要是客厅和卧室的整理，预计需要2-3小时。',
      status: 'pending',
      createdAt: '2025-11-06T12:45:00.000Z',
      viewCount: 45,
      shortlistCount: 12,
      requesterId: 'pin-user-004',
      requesterName: 'PIN用户4',
      requesterEmail: 'pin4@example.com',
      requesterPhone: '138-0004-0004',
      requesterAddress: '深圳市南山区科技园南区'
    },
    {
      id: 'req-005',
      title: '老人陪伴聊天',
      category: 'companion',
      description: '我是一位独居老人，希望有年轻人能来陪我聊天，分享一些生活趣事，让我不那么孤单。',
      location: '杭州市西湖区文三路',
      urgency: 'low',
      expectedDate: '2025-11-10',
      expectedTime: '15:00',
      volunteersNeeded: 1,
      contactMethod: 'phone',
      additionalNotes: '每周定期陪伴，时间灵活，主要是聊天和下棋。',
      status: 'pending',
      createdAt: '2025-11-06T09:30:00.000Z',
      viewCount: 20,
      shortlistCount: 5,
      requesterId: 'pin-user-005',
      requesterName: 'PIN用户5',
      requesterEmail: 'pin5@example.com',
      requesterPhone: '138-0005-0005',
      requesterAddress: '杭州市西湖区文三路100号'
    }
  ];

  // 保存测试数据到localStorage
  localStorage.setItem('userRequests', JSON.stringify(testRequests));
  console.log('测试数据已初始化，共', testRequests.length, '条请求');
};

// 清除测试数据的函数
export const clearTestData = () => {
  localStorage.removeItem('userRequests');
  console.log('测试数据已清除');
};

// 添加单个测试请求的函数
export const addTestRequest = (requestData) => {
  const existingRequests = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userRequests') || '[]');
  const newRequest = {
    id: `req-${Date.now()}`,
    ...requestData,
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    viewCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 50),
    shortlistCount: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10),
    status: 'pending'
  };
  
  existingRequests.push(newRequest);
  localStorage.setItem('userRequests', JSON.stringify(existingRequests));
  console.log('已添加测试请求:', newRequest.title);
  return newRequest;
};
